text:
Greetings to all,
I've been working on DiffEqOperators and got my proposal reviewed by the mentor a while ago. Sharing that <https://drive.google.com/file/d/18JHb2K_fbkTVDuKnv-UQySa1G3Hvblm_/view?usp=sharing|here> for additional inputs. Looking forward to your suggestions, Thanks! :blush:

text: This is nice. If this has any knock-on effects for the eco system, other packages or enable new things for users and in what industries they might want to solve such problems, i would put this information in a prominent position such as a section on it's own called motivation or something,
